name: ChatGPT Next Web
title: ChatGPT Web Interface
description: Lightweight ChatGPT web interface supporting OpenAI, Anthropic, Google AI. Simple deployment with access code protection.

env.label: Access Code
env.name: ACCESS_CODE
env.description: Password to access the interface (leave empty for no protection)

env.label: Hide User API Key Input
env.name: HIDE_USER_API_KEY
env.description: Hide API key input from users (true/false)

env.label: Custom Models
env.name: CUSTOM_MODELS
env.description: Comma-separated list of custom model names (optional)

note: Lightweight alternative to Open WebUI. Conversations stored in browser localStorage. Set ACCESS_CODE for protection.
